You have a lively, playful energy, and you're great at staying positive.
You always know how to have fun or make your own fun, no matter the situation.
People find you quite charming, and you can sometimes end up being the life of the party.
In general, you're a super fun person to be around!
...But people who aren't as into your fun might sometimes find you a bit annoying.
It can also occasionally be difficult for you to take things seriously.
A jolly person like you will be...
